headline: Jim Cramer: Nucor’s (NUE) Steel Problem Could Signal Bigger Issues Ahead
summary: We recently published a list of the Jim Cramer Just Discussed These 13 Stocks. headline: Nucor Projects Q4 Earnings to Decline on Lower Selling Prices
summary: The main cause of the expected decline in NUE's Q4 profitability is the steel mills segment's lower earnings due to lower volumes and average selling prices.
